edu.example.embSys.mma.hardwareAdapter
Class HardwareFactory

java.lang.Object
  edu.example.embSys.mma.hardwareAdapter.HardwareFactory

public class HardwareFactory
extends java.lang.Object

* Initialises the hardware components and checks if either a simulated or the sensor of the device should be used. A factory for creating Hardware objects.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Dionysios Satikidis (dionysios.satikidis@gmail.com)
